creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The AJP Sampler now uses the same GUI as the other HTTP Samplers.

However it looks as though the conversion was incomplete, as it does not use the timeout fields.

Possible approaches:
- use the fields (where appropriate) to configure the appropriate timeout
- disable the fields to show they are not used (and document this)

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: Note by the way that AJP Sampler is not in component reference.
